entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h except northeast 30 gusting to 50 through mainland inlets and valleys in the morning. Wind becoming light near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:49 AM PST Tuesday 14 February 2023
